caption.p: The relative rates of change in mean biomass carbon density in the 25 giant panda nature reserves in five mountain ranges (Minshan, Qionglaishan, Daxiangling, Xiaoxiangling and Liangshan) from 1988 to 2012. Maps were made with ArcGIS version 10.2.2 for desktop ( http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis).
